phrases: A warm breeze stirs the cherry tree branches, and tickles my hair.
As of today, I am a first-year student in high school...
All righty, my wishes came true, and I got into a co-ed school near my house.
At this moment, my heart is full of anticipation for my new life!
I wonder what high school's like?
For now, on this first day, with the sky so blue, and the cherry blossoms in bloom,
I am somehow getting the feeling that I am about to embark on a splendid romance!
But it is my first day and I am already in a bind!
Hey, little girl, you sure are sweet!
Come have some fun with us!
Wh-Whoa... wh-what am I going to do?
And since I went to an all-girls' junior high, I am not comfortable around guys!
I am starting to pass out...
Cannot you see she does not want to go with you?
Stand up to us and we will make you sorry, damn you!
It is too early in the day for this.
Come on, just chill, will you?
Oh... but I cannot hold on anymore...
What is up with these guys?
You guys, I told you not to tag along...
Oh, man, she must have been scared out of her life.
I cannot just leave her like this...
This uniform she is wearing - it is our school's, right?
These other guys were bugging me, and he made a dashing entrance!
I just know it was fate that brought us together!
On top of that, he carried me to the nurse's office when I fainted...
Seriously, how kind and gentle is that?
Is that why you ditched me this morning?
Well, I am glad you are okay.
Sorry, Fu. I never dreamed anything like that would happen...
But you never saw his face, and you do not know his name, either, right?
You think you will ever see him again?
Oh, I will see him again, I am sure of it...
I mean, he was wearing our school's uniform.
There is no question he is here at this school...
And it is not like I do not have any clues...
Next time I see him, I have got to thank him properly...
I am going to be sitting here... so we are neighbors, right?
It is so nice to meet...
Not only that, but she is gorgeous!
Oh, no need for you to tell me your name.
Since I am not going to bother remembering it.
Wh-What kind of attitude is that?
That was just a little too cold...
It looked way too heavy to be a toy...
Could it be that she is actually really scary?
It may be important to search for that prince,
but there is someone else I have got to hunt down, no matter what!
I have got to find him or else...
So anyway, just wait till you hear what happened after, it was awful!
So tell me, what happened after that?
This is why I cannot stand guys...
I am so sorry to make you help me like this...
It is on my way, anyway.
Judging from the color of your tie, you are a first-year, right?
You are an upperclassman, are not you?
If you have any questions, ask me anything.
I think he looks like the guy from this morning...
The way she is acting, looks like she does not remember me at all.
No need to make her feel like she owes me anything.
I am going to keep my mouth shut.
But to be honest, you really saved me!
I am still not really sure where the faculty room is and all...
You have set my mind at ease a little.
See, I went to an all-girls' school for junior high, so I was a little nervous about going to a co-ed school.
But now I know that there are kind and gentle guys like you.
A guy from this school came to my rescue...
Well, I am glad to hear that...
What I would really like is to thank him in person,
but the thing is, I do not know what he looks like or what his name is...
You said you were a second-year, right?
Well, actually, it is both him and one other person...
There is another second-year student that I have to find... would you happen to know him?
I have heard rumors that he is famous at this school...
Excuse me, but are there any other people at this school named Ichijo?
No, I am pretty sure I am the only one.
Then are you that Raku Ichijo?
The son of the leader of the Shuei-gumi yakuzas!
Who, despite having a drop-dead gorgeous girlfriend,
has a whole entourage of pretty girls at his beck and call,
and who is rumored to be running the whole school behind-the-scenes, thanks to his father's authority?
Hold up, hold up, hold up!
What kind of rumors are those?
Please do not come near me!
Then do not tell me that just now...
Just now, the reason you were so nice to me...
That was one of your ploys to worm yourself into a girl's favor, was not it?
I thought you were so nice...
At least hear a person out...
I have just one thing to say to you!
You would think you would have outgrown bears in high school...
You are the enemy of all women!
Sister, do not you worry about a thing!
Now that I am here, you are safe, all right?
I am Kosaki Onodera's younger sister!
So now we are going to be second-years, huh, Ruri?
I hope I get to be in the same class as Ichijo again...
Hmm, so the guy she has a crush on is named Ichijo?
Come on... that is really mean, Ruri!
What were we talking about again?
I hear that there is a really scary upperclassman at your high school, Haru!
They say he is the son of a yakuza...
Tell me more about him, will you!?
Now that I have actually met him, I can see it clearly.
Just as I thought, this guy is dangerous!
I will bet he is totally playing my sister...
I have got to protect her!
You did mention having a kid sister the other day...
I am never going to let you get your hands on my sister, understand?
Haru, what are you talking about!?
I have been hearing this commotion...
Amazing... she looks just like a model!
Hey... could she be the drop-dead gorgeous girlfriend?
The rumors were all true, after all!
So you have a little sister, Kosaki!
Does he have something on you!?
Because otherwise, it does not make sense!
A person like you, so drop-dead gorgeous, so stylish, who seems so likable...
With someone who is so obviously a loser?
Who looks so shallow and unpleasant...
It makes no sense at all that you would be seeing him!
How could say such a thing, Haru?
I get that you are upset, but that kind of talk is uncalled for!
Come on, Chitoge, you tell her, too!
I see, so your name is Haru, huh?
You are such a sweet, good little girl, are not you, Haru?
Would you care to join me for tea over here?
I am telling you, stop clinging to me!
Oh, please, where is the harm?
Listen, listen, listen, listen, Master Raku...
Is this girl another one of Ichijo's groupies?
Come now, you do not mind, do you, Master Raku?
H-H-How can you just stand in the middle of the hall
There is no need to be so bashful!
without a care in the world, your arms around a guy?
Not only that, but he is got a girlfriend!
Does not that mean anything to you?
I see you are still but a mere child.
Love is something that you must see through to the end.
Even in the face of such obstacles as girlfriends,
so long as you have love, there is nothing that you cannot overcome!
And so, Master Raku, now that we are going to be second-years,
is not it about time you discarded your outmoded girlfriend, and switched over to me?
I do offer a discount for switching, you know!
Do not talk about me like I am a used car!
Is this person seriously in love with Ichijo?
Haru, Ichijo is not quite the villain you think he is.
I do not know what kind of rumors you have heard, but rumors are just rumors, okay?
You are too nice, that is why you see him that way.
After all, this person got a look at my underwear!
What kind of underwear do I have on today again?
Tell me... what does she mean, darling?
A guy like that sneaking a peek at my underwear!
And my sister does not believe me...
Animal Care Looking for New Members
What should I do now that I am in high school?
Animal Care Looking for New Members
There is something called Animal Care!
Being surrounded by adorable animals who heal my soul... that might be nice!
What is that guy doing here!?
Why do I have to run into him in a place like this?
Actually, why is he taking care of animals, anyway?
No way am I going to end up in the same club as him...
I wonder if Onodera's going to show up today...
It would be just the two of us right now...
And then we could just head home together...
Well, not that that would ever happen, but...
You are awful, you know that?
Did she hear me just now?
I cannot believe you are trying to make a move on my sister,
when you have such a beautiful girlfriend!
Now there is no doubt in my mind!
You are everything I have heard you are - a low-life piece of trash!
I will never let you get your hands on my sis
Now that I am seeing them up close, those bears are pretty cute.
It is been a while since we took a bath together, Haru.
Are you still mad at Ichijo?
I am never going to forgive that guy!
I hate myself for even thinking for a second that he was nice!
You do not have to go that far...
Ichijo is a nice person, you know.
Sure, maybe today you did not happen to see it, but...
What makes you think he is a good person?
Well, I am not sure that I can explain what it is...
I guess in a word, it is how he can be so sweet.
What part of that guy is...
He is always thinking about other people, and if he sees someone in trouble, he cannot just stand by.
He stops caring instantly what is going to happen to him, and...
If it makes that person happy, he can be happy right along with her from the bottom of his heart...
That is the kind of person he is...
You know, I never asked you, what is it that you love about him?
I really think you and Ichijo could get to be good friends.
Oh, I think I will pass.
I have no interest in him!
Sister, you are just too nice... that is why you cannot see him for what he is.
Just as I thought, I will have to protect you...
By the way, what was that you said on our way home about a prince?
Today, I had a fateful encounter, you see!
What a fiasco that was today.
Who knew she would start to hate me that much...
Guess I am out of luck.
Today I am just going to take a bath and crash.
I wonder if I will see that prince again?
I wonder what grade he is in?
He was tall, so maybe he is a third-year?
I wonder what kind of person he is...
Gentle, and someone you can count on...
I just hope I can find him somehow...
I almost forgot that I had a precious clue!
Damn that Chitoge, for God's sake...
- What is going on, Young Master?
I hope I can find you!
A few days later, Raku found out the truth.
